programme.desc: Hong usa sua visão moral e habilidades para lutar e salvar um bairro de traficantes de drogas e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: Run Silent, Run Deep, (1958, War)
programme.desc: The legendary Clark Gable and Burt Lancaster star in this gripping, classic military drama as a submarine commander (Gable) drives his men and his 1st officer (Lancaster) to the brink of mutiny in his quest to sink an enemy sub. Robert Wise directs.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: Odd Man Out, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

programme.title: Attack, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: Eddie Albert is a cowardly captain, Lee Marvin a crooked colonel, and Jack Palance a diligent lieutenant as a small platoon fights its way back from the front in director Robert Aldrich's searing WWII drama.

programme.title: Ten Seconds to Hell, (1959, War)
programme.desc: In this gritty WW II classic from director Robert Aldrich, Jeff Chandler and Jack Palance star as demolition experts who return to bombed-out Berlin to accept the very dangerous job of defusing unexploded bombs scattered throughout the city.

programme.title: The Best Years of Our Lives, (1946, War)
programme.desc: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

programme.title: Killer's Kiss, (1955, Thriller)
programme.desc: This dazzling film noir from Stanley Kubrick is about a struggling New York boxer (Jamie Smith), whose life is imperiled when he protects a nightclub dancer (Irene Kane) from her gangster boss.

programme.title: The Killing, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: With fascinating detail, Stanley Kubrick lays bare the intricate inner-planning of a racetrack heist by a deadly mastermind (Sterling Hayden) and his crew. Co-stars Coleen Gray.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A proud movie theater owner must defend his family business from corporate developers alongside a legendary action star as art imitates life in a showdown for the ages.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: In the Line of Fire, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gripping, gut-wrenching thriller that delivers suspense in almost unbearable doses, IN THE LINE OF FIRE showcases Clint Eastwood at his finest. In a performance that won universal acclaim, Eastwood stars as Frank Horrigan. Rated: R

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A hit man must beat the top assassins in the world.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: Cujo, (1983, Horror)
programme.desc: While Donna and Vic Trenton struggle to save their rocky marriage, their son Tad befriends the loveable 200-lb St. Bernard who belongs to their mechanic.

programme.title: Dolls, (1986, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: The Hartwicke's vast collection of dolls is fun to play with and nice to look at, but beneath the painted faces of their lifelike dolls lie murderous creatures with a vengeance for blood!

programme.title: Devon, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Years after Devon disappeared, a mysterious website draws five adventurers to the abandoned asylum where she was last seen. Armed with cameras, they plunge into the darkness, unaware they’re filming their own descent into horror—never meant to return.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers, (2001, Horror)
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of a old church, Trish and her brother Darry watch their routine road trip home turn into a heart stopping race for their lives. They are now the chosen prey of a force that relentlessly pursues them.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: The Haunting, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat supernatural thriller featuring Hollywood's hottest stars, a study in fear escalates into a heart-stopping nightmare for a professor and three subjects trapped in a mysterious mansion.

programme.title: Boogeyman, (2005, Horror)

programme.desc: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Legionnaire, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Alain is a boxer in 1925 Marseille, France. When he doesn't take the dive paid to take by a mob boss, he has to split. He joins the Foreign Legion and is sent to Morocco. He makes 3 friends and they watch each other's backs.

programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme plays a fashion designer who must join forces with a C.I.A. agent to combat terrorism.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude van Damme ("Bloodsport", "Cyborg") is a veteran undercover cop posing as an inmate in a dangerously corrupt state prison.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat's back on! And Eddie Murphy is cool as ever in this sizzling, smash-hit sequel to Beverly Hills Cop.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Eddie's back! So are the laughs. Eddie Murphy returns as Detroit cop Axel Foley, getting down with the fun-and-sun set as never before in this revved up thrill-ride of a movie.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Soapdish, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Sally Field leads an all-star cast in this side-splittingly funny look at a scandal-ridden TV soap opera.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Proof, (2005, Drama)

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally, (1989, Romance)
programme.desc: As Harry Burns and Sally Albright build their lives and careers in Manhattan, their paths continue to cross and their friendship continues to grow … until they confront the decision whether to let their friendship develop into romance.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan star in an enchanting romance about a widower whose son convinces him to find new love and the woman who answers his call.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire is a sports agent who is brought to a point of crisis in his life when he decides to become an honorable man. Follow his journey to redemption through an unlikely alliance with a female accountant, and his least important client.

programme.title: No Strings Attached, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A hilarious story about Emma and Adam who set up a seemingly perfect arrangement with each other based soley on sex and having only one cardinal rule: No Strings Attached.

programme.title: The Professional, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: The mysterious Leon (Jean Reno) is New York's top hitman. When his next-door neighbors are murdered, Leon becomes the unwilling guardian of the family's sole survivor - 12-year-old Mathilda (Natalie Portman). Rating:R

programme.title: Child 44, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Exiled secret police officer Leo Demidov (Tom Hardy) discovers a serial killer and suspects his superiors of covering it up. It is up to Leo to stop the killer before he strikes again.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub is heading for the U.S. coast; however, one CIA analyst thinks the captain will defect the submarine, and he only has hours to prove it.

programme.title: Armored, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: A crew of officers at an armored transport security firm embark on the ultimate heist – against their own company. The seemingly fool-proof plan soon proves to be useless when an unexpected witness interferes, as the plan quickly unravels.

programme.title: Drive, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Hollywood stunt performer (Ryan Gosling) who moonlights as a wheelman discovers that a contract has been put on him after a heist gone wrong.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: The Burnt Orange Heresy, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Hired to steal a rare painting, an ambitious art dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

programme.title: Filly Brown, (2013, Hip-Hop/Rap)
programme.desc: A promising hip-hop rhymer from Los Angeles finds herself in a gray area when a record producer offers her a compromising shot at stardom.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Action)

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: American Outlaws, (2001, Action)

programme.title: Billy the Kid, (2013, Action)

programme.title: Frank and Jesse, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: After the defeat of the South in the Civil War and the murder of their younger brother, Frank and Jesse James seek their own brand of justice. As outlaws, they gain fame for their daring hold-ups of banks, trains, and stagecoaches.

programme.title: Jane Got a Gun, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)

programme.title: Wild Bill, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Wild Bill focuses on the last days of gunfighter, Wild Bill Hickok, consorting in Deadwood with Calamity Jane, observed by a longtime friend, and haunted by the ghosts of his past, from an old flame to a young man who announces his intention to kill Bill.

programme.title: ParaNorman, (2012, Science fiction)

programme.title: Noah, (2014, Action)

programme.title: The Patriot, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: In 1776 South Carolina, widower and legendary war hero Benjamin Martin (Mel Gibson) finds himself thrust into the midst of the American Revolutionary War as he helplessly watches his family torn apart by the savage forces of the British Redcoats.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes’ assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryan’s act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: The Matrix, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence. Every second becomes a fight to stay alive - to escape The Matrix.

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: In the second chapter of the Matrix trilogy, Zion falls under siege to the Machine Army. Neo and Trinity choose to return to the Matrix with Morpheus. Now, Neo must follow the path he has chosen if he is to save humanity.

programme.title: Hundreds of Beavers, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: A drunken applejack salesman must go from zero to hero and become North America's greatest fur trapper by defeating Hundreds of Beavers.

programme.title: Kalifornia, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: A graduate student and his girlfriend set out on a cross-country road trip to research a book they are writing on serial killers. Along the way, they pick up an ex-con and his girlfriend who will take them on a ride they'll never forget.

programme.title: Surfer, Dude, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Longboarding soul surfer Steve Addington (Matthew McConaughey) returns to Malibu for the summer to find his cool hometown vibe corrupted.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Screwball)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: UHF, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The manager of a small-time UHF station which has the lowest ratings in the country inadvertently hits it big with his strange programming ideas to keep Channel 62 from going down the tubes.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: The Innkeepers, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: After over one hundred years of service, The Yankee Pedlar Inn is shutting its doors for good. The last remaining employees - Claire and Luke - are determined to uncover proof of what many believe to be one of New England's most haunted hotels.

programme.title: Alone, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: During a global pandemic, a man must battle swarming hordes of the undead to rescue a female neighbor. This zombie horror tale stars Tyler Posey, Summer Spiro, and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: Wolf Creek, (2005, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Stranded backpackers in remote Australia fall prey to a murderous bushman who offers to fix their car, then takes them captive.

programme.title: We Are What We Are, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: The Parkers, reclusive people who cling to ancient customs, find their secret lives threatened when a torrential downpour and the death of the family matriarch forces daughters Iris and Rose to assume special responsibilities.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: P2, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman who is the last to leave her office on Christmas Eve must rely on her wits to survive when she is trapped in a parking garage with a deranged security guard.

programme.title: The Babadook, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.title: The Woman in Black, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Author Kipps (Daniel Radcliffe), a widowed lawyer, is sent to a remote village to sort out the affairs of a recently deceased eccentric. But upon his arrival, it soon becomes clear that everyone in the own is keeping a deadly secret.

programme.title: The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: 40 years after the first haunting at Eel Marsh House, a group of children evacuated from WWII London arrives, awakening the house's darkest inhabitant.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: When a young Amish woman and her son get caught up in the murder of an undercover narcotic's agent, their saviour turns out to be hardened Philadelphia detective John Book.

programme.title: Hamburger Hill, (1987, War)
programme.desc: On the 11th May 1969, troops of the 101st airborne division engaged the enemy at the base of Hill 937 in the Ashau Valley. Ten days and eleven bloody assaults later, the troops who fought there called it Hamburger Hill.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction, (1987, Drama)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas plays Dan, a New York attorney who has a tryst with seductive Alex Forrest while his wife is away. Dan later shrugs off the affair as a mistake and considers it over. But Alex won't be ignored. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.

programme.title: Road to Perdition, (2002, Thriller)

programme.title: The Limey, (1999, Thriller)

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)

programme.title: Road to Perdition, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson stars as a Los Angeles policeman who recently lost his wife and has been acting increasingly unstable. Danny Glover plays a homicide detective with an impeccable record and a loving family. Now the two are stuck with each other as partners.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover are back as a volatile pair of LAPD detectives. This time, the cops are unhappy with their assignment to baby-sit an accountant. But the mob wants the accountant dead—and is killing everyone who gets in its way.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Police officers Riggs (Mel Gibson) and Murtaugh (Danny Glover) team for the third time. This time, they must track down a crooked cop who has stolen weapons from the Los Angeles police depot.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 4, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover reteam as a pair of Los Angeles police detectives. Promoted to desk jobs to keep them out of trouble, the two cops join forces with a junior detective and a fast-talking private investigator to unravel a series of crimes.

programme.title: Band Aid, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, a couple turns all their fights into songs and starts a band with their neighbor.

programme.title: Hearts Beat Loud, (2018, Comedy)
programme.desc: A father and daughter form an unlikely songwriting duo in the summer before she leaves for college.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)

programme.title: The Commitments, (1991, Soundtrack)

programme.title: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind, (2002, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: While a maverick creator of America's favorite game shows gains notoriety for his smash TV hits, he is also drawn into a shadowy world of danger as a covert government operative. George Clooney directs this incredible stranger-than-fiction story.

programme.title: Suburbicon, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: From director George Clooney, Suburbicon is the perfect place for Gardner Lodge (Matt Damon) to raise a family. But the tranquil surface masks a disturbing reality, as Gardner must navigate the town's dark underbelly of betrayal, deceit, and violence.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Science fiction)

programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?

programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Movie
programme.desc: Heroic Yugi squares off against archrival Kaiba in an adventure even more dangerous when the imaginary monsters in their playing cards become ferociously real…and when an old evil enters the fray.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Bonds Beyond Time
programme.desc: It's a whole new deal! For the first time, Yugi, Jaden & Yusei are together in an all-new adventure!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions
programme.desc: The stakes have never been higher, the rivalries never as fierce, the risks never so great. One wrong move - one card short - and it's game over for good.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Movie
programme.desc: Heroic Yugi squares off against archrival Kaiba in an adventure even more dangerous when the imaginary monsters in their playing cards become ferociously real…and when an old evil enters the fray.

programme.title: At the banquet, the Shogun Orochi starts to talk about his late old enemy which bores the attendees. Suddenly, the Oiran's child attendant Toko bursts with laughter and won't stop. Orochi becomes furious and attacks her.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pandemonium! The Monster Snake, Shogun Orochi!

programme.title: In order to save her child attendant Toko, the top Oiran Komurasaki stands up to the Shogun Orochi, but the yakuza boss Kyoshiro interrupts and does something that no one expected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Flower Falls! The Final Moment of the Most Beautiful Woman in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: Nami, Robin, and the others got away from Oden's Castle and now discuss what they have found out about the enemy so far. Meanwhile, Chopper's group sets off to rescue Luffy from the Excavation Labor Camp.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Prisoners! Luffy and Old Man Hyo!

programme.title: At the Excavation Labor Camp in Udon, Luffy tries to save Old Man Hyo and stands up to Vice Warden Daifuku and Warden Babanuki with his physical strength weakened by the Sea Prism Stone cuffs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Lead Performer! Queen the Plague Emerges!

programme.title: Luffy and Old Man Hyo try to climb up the wall and break out of the Excavation Labor Camp, but Queen the Plague stands in their way and gives them a hard time!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy fights quite a few Queen's men at once in the deadly sumo match while protecting Old Man Hyo! Meanwhile, Nami, Robin, and Shinobu are cornered as Hawkins comes to raid the bathhouse.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dead or Alive! Queen's Sumo Inferno!

programme.title: Luffy deals with the endless supply of opponents trying to figure out the way to use Haki that Rayleigh taught him a while ago. Meanwhile, Zoro faces Gyukimaru who is accusing him of stealing Shusui.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Gyukimaru! Zoro Fights a Duel on Bandit's Bridge!

programme.title: The duel between Zoro and Gyukimaru is interrupted by Kamazo, Orochi's assassin who came after a little girl Toko. Without Shusui, Zoro has a hard time fighting the two at the same time, but he finds an unlikely third sword to take down the enemies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Turnover! The Three-Sword Style Overcomes Danger!

programme.title: Luffy's next enemies in the deadly sumo match in the Excavation Labor Camp are two tough Gifters. Much to Old Man Hyo's surprise, Luffy keeps practicing using Haki properly at the same time as he fights them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro, Stunned! The Shocking Identity of the Mysterious Woman!

programme.title: Hiyori tells Zoro a stunning story of escaping the incident 20 years ago and surviving until the present day. Meanwhile, Luffy stills struggles to master the Haki of the Color of Arms, but a surprising person steps up and gives an example.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Get the Hang of It! The Land of Wano's Haki - Ryuo!

programme.title: Luffy continues training himself to use Haki with Old Man Hyo's help, but the battle is suddenly suspended and shortly thereafter Raizo appears in front of them. Meanwhile, Nami, Usopp, and the others are wondering who Tonoyasu really is.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ushimitsu Kozo the great thief who robbed from the rich and gave to the poor gets caught and his true identity stuns Orochi and the others. When Toko hears the news, she gets very upset and so is Zoro when he hears the reason.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking the Nation! The Identity of Ushimitsu Kozo The Chivalrous Thief!

programme.title: Tonoyasu has been strung up and is soon-to-be executed. The people of the Land of Wano recognize who he really is and start raising their voice while the Straw Hats rush to save him. Then, Tonoyasu starts addressing the nation.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Straw Hats Run! Save the Captive Tonoyasu!

programme.title: By the time Kin'emon and the others notice that Yasuie is trying to sacrifice his life to save their raid plan, it was all too late. Ebisu Town's people laughing out loud annoys Zoro, but when Hiyori tells him the reason behind it, he is in for a shock!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro's Fury! The Truth About the Smile!

programme.title: Hiyori and Shinobu tearfully tell the Straw Hats the truth behind Ebisu Town residents' cheerfulness and smiles, which infuriates them. When Yasuie's daughter, Toko, runs to her father's body, Orochi recognizes who she is and takes a shot at her!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro and Sanji start fighting against Orochi's clan. Nami and the rest of the Straw Hats join them. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp, a new criminal, Hitokiri Kamazo, has arrived.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Straw Hats Step In! An Uproarious Deadly Battle at the Execution Ground!

programme.title: Zoro keeps fighting Kyoshiro, but Orochi's Oniwabanshu comes to back Kyoshiro up. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp, Queen announces the restart of the Sumo Inferno with a new cruel rule.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy's Determination! Win Through the Sumo Inferno!

programme.title: Kin'emon apologizes Ashura Doji AKA Shutenmaru for goading Holdem to attack Atamayama where Ashura's hideout was located, and asks him to join the fight against Kaido. Meanwhile, Chopper and his group finally arrived at the Excavation Labor Camp!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Storm Has Come! A Raging Big Mom!

programme.title: Craving red-bean soup, Big Mom attacks Queen, the Animal Kingdom Pirates' Lead Performer who reins over Udon. However, when she finds out that the pot is empty, she turns her wrath against the one who ate it all: Luffy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Grudge Over Red-bean Soup! Luffy Gets into a Desperate Situation!

programme.title: After finding out that Luffy ate the whole pot ofthe red-bean soup that she was looking for, Big Mom becomes infuriated and goesafter him. Meanwhile, Queen, the Lead Performer, comes up with a plan to stopthe rampaging Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen's Secret Plan!

programme.title: Queen hastily ties up the sleeping Big Mom and carries her to Onigashima leaving Udon to Babanuki. Babanuki uses a weapon that Queen made to threaten inmates and make them catch Luffy, but a mysterious figure emerges from the forbidden cell to save Luffy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!

programme.title: Kawamatsu the Kappa is freed and stands up against Babanuki and his underlings! Listening to Old Man Hyo's suggestion, Raizo and Kiku reveal their true identities which give the desperate prisoners not only a shock but also some hope.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Akazaya Samurai!

programme.title: Luffy faces those who are infected by the Plague Rounds and the non-infected prisoners who submit to the authority of Udon. To open their eyes, Luffy takes a measure that will risk his life. However, the Chief Warden Babanuki has something up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: We’re Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!

programme.title: The freed prisoners in Udon refuse to fight alongside Luffy because he is a pirate. Raizo and Old Man Hyo try their best to convince them, but an unexpected person stands up to bring the prisoners hope after taking down Kaido!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!

programme.title: After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi's ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Orochi's Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami and Franky join Kanjuro who has taken Yasuie's dead body to bury him with Oden, and together they hit the road. Robin, Usopp, and Brook are at the dock trying to figure out a way to pass through a check point.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!

programme.title: As the clash between Kaido and Big Mom continues, Queen looks for a way to get out of Onigashima. Meanwhile in Udon, Old Man Hyo finds his former allies, four bosses from each region.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiyori's Confession! A Reunion at Bandit's Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro runs after the warrior-monk who took his Shusui and Kawamatsu shares with Hiyori his memory of a fox that was guarding the graves in Ringo. As they catch up to Zoro, they find a room filled with swords.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Great Swords!

programme.title: As the day of the raid approaches, Law finds someone who might help him escape the prison and Kin'emon gathers up most of his main allies to discuss the raid plan. Meanwhile, at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a stunning declaration!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Alliance?! Kaido’s Army Gathers!

programme.title: Kin'emon, Momonosuke, and the others can't fight back tears when they hear that Hiyori is alive. Zoro is stunned by Enma's demonic power and its ties to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!

programme.title: The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!

programme.title: Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance of the two Emperors of the Sea. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Navy soldiers about the legendary Rocks Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!

programme.title: On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi leaves the mainland of the Land of Wano heading for Onigashima where a big banquet will take place.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #21: The Last Job
programme.desc: Lupin and his companions have their sights on a Japanese cultural treasure, a priceless Buddha statue. But when a mysterious group of ninja thieves get the jump on them, it might just be the gang's last job!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Good-Bye Partner"
programme.desc: When Zenigata is arrested for suspicion of being part of the Lupin gang, Lupin is talked into stealing Time Crystal to prove Pops' innocence.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose…

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Set in 79 A.D., POMPEII tells the epic story of Milo, a slave turned invincible gladiator who finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: The Dark Command, (1940, Western)
programme.desc: A Civil War tale based on the exploits of the notorious outlaw William Quantrill. A courageous sheriff stands up to Quantrill and his band of guerrillas pillaging the countryside in Civil War-torn Kansas, and stops the raids.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: Rio Grande, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Lt. Col. Yorke leads his cavalry troops to the Rio Grande to fight a warring tribe. Yorke’s toughest battle lies ahead when his unorthodox plan to outwit the elusive Apaches leads to possible court-martial.

programme.title: The Ex, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After getting fired, a man winds up working for his wife's father while she takes care of the baby.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Cady thinks she understands "survival of the fittest." However, the law of the wild takes a whole new meaning when the homeschooled 15-year-old enters public high school for the first time.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Ghost Town, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: A spirited romantic comedy, Ghost Town is the story of Bertram Pincus, a cranky Manhattan dentist who develops the unwelcome ability to see dead people.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Cady thinks she understands "survival of the fittest." However, the law of the wild takes a whole new meaning when the homeschooled 15-year-old enters public high school for the first time.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Ghost Town, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: A spirited romantic comedy, Ghost Town is the story of Bertram Pincus, a cranky Manhattan dentist who develops the unwelcome ability to see dead people.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Timeline, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: Still-paranoid Alexandrians get riled up over the Whisperers and take their fear out on Negan; at Hilltop, the group deals with an unexpected safety issue.

programme.title: The group must figure out how to get out of a precarious situation.

programme.title: The group must defend Alexandria from a threatening outside force.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Whisperers are coming for Hilltop; after Daryl and Lydia's encounter with Alpha, the communities must decide whether to run or fight; Eugene's communication with Stephanie gets complicated.

programme.title: Michonne takes Virgil back to his mysterious island to reunite with his family; in exchange, Virgil promises weapons that could change the tide of the Whisperer War.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: With Negan's help, Alpha and the Whisperers attack Hilltop.

programme.title: Heroes and villains reckon with the aftermath of the Hilltop fire; Eugene takes a group on a journey to meet Stephanie, with the hopes of befriending another civilization.

programme.title: The communities prepare for the final battle of the Whisperer War; meanwhile, Eugene's group encounters Princess.

programme.title: Daryl and Carol find an old cabin that takes Daryl back to his years away from the group after Rick disappeared; he relives the painful memory of meeting a reticent survivor and the toxic events that amplified his relationship with Dog.

programme.title: With Maggie's map, Gabriel and Aaron search for food and supplies to bring back to Alexandria; checking out one more location, they chance upon a stash; faith is broken and optimism is fragmented when they are put to the ultimate test.

programme.title: With Maggie back at Alexandria, Carol takes Negan on a journey to minimize the increasing tension; here, Negan reflects on his late wife, Lucille, and the events that led him to this point.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl leads a mission team to scavenge the military base he discovered; Maggie tells her story, prompting a new mission for survival that only Negan can lead; Eugene and his group go through assessment by the Commonwealth's paramilitary police.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.desc: Usagi and the girls are searching for Luna, who has gone missing. To their surprise, they find Luna being introduced on TV as Yaten’s pet cat.

programme.desc: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.

programme.desc: Usagi and the girls try to buy tickets to a Three Lights concert. Michiru gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be preforming.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seiya asks Usagi out on a date, to which she agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiya’s star seed.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Luna encounter a girl who appears to be lost. The two are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagi’s house as her younger sister.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with lots of snacks. Curious where she’s getting the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi teamed up with Seiya for the school softball tournament. Usagi becomes a target of Seiya’s jealous fans, who think she is hitting on him.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A rift is created between the Sailor Guardians and the Star Lights after they discover each other’s secret identities.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and the other Outer Guardians warn the Star Lights to never see Sailor Moon again. Usagi is worried about Seiya after he gets injured.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of becoming an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moon’s true identity.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Princess Kakyu appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.desc: Mary is fed up with her husband’s lack of income.

programme.title: FOX SOUL Faceoff
programme.desc: FOX SOUL Faceoff talks about those hot topic issues a lot of us are afraid to talk about!

programme.title: FOX SOUL Faceoff
programme.desc: A discussion of issues many people are afraid to talk about.

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: Exploring provocative topics with an open mind and a cocktail in hand.

programme.title: We Sound Crazy
programme.desc: We Sound Crazy Podcast with special guest Lecrae.

programme.title: Side Dish
programme.desc: An interactive YouTube live show featuring Dish Nation hosts Headkrack and Tanner Thomason.

programme.title: Sharknado 4: Corra para o 4º
programme.desc: Cinco anos após a onda de sharknados que assolou a costa leste, nossos heróis vivem uma vida tranquila no meio do país - o mais longe possível dos tubarões. Mas quando um estranho sharknado de areia atinge Las Vegas, Fin é jogado de volta à ação, lutando contra sharknados em uma corrida cross-country para salvar sua família e o mundo - como toda a humanidade já deveria saber, não há como escapar..

programme.title: Condução Perigosa
programme.desc: Peter Roberts (Thomas Jane), um ex-piloto de corrida automotiva, tornou-se instrutor de motorista e durante uma de suas aulas é sequestrado por Simon Keller (John Cusack), que supostamente seria um aluno como qualquer outro. O sequestrador misterioso força ele a participar de um crime que coloca ambos na mira da polícia e da máfia, desencadeando uma perseguição.

programme.title: Golpe de Risco
programme.desc: Carregado de muita ação, este filme une os maiores ladrões do mundo na tentativa de executar o roubo do século.

programme.title: Caçador de Demônios
programme.desc: Um caçador de demônios viaja até uma pequena cidade na esperança de enterrar um antigo, mas indestrutível demônio. Quando a entidade do mal é libertada acidentalmente, ela começa a possuir e matar os moradores da região, um por um.

programme.title: Iceman: O Viajante do Tempo
programme.desc: Iceman 2: O Viajante do Tempo acompanha os guerreiros da China que foram congelados acidentalmente por 400 anos e acordam na moderna Hong Kong. Ao serem descongelados, retornam no tempo para a batalha que deixaram para trás e conseguirem mudar o destino de sua aldeia.

programme.title: O Último Homem
programme.desc: A história verídica de um homem da lei recentemente viúvo que faz amizade com um menino morrendo de tuberculose e uma senhora do bordel local enquanto sua cidade está sendo violentamente tomada por uma gangue de criadores de gado do Texas.

programme.title: Sharknado
programme.desc: Quando um furacão estranho inunda Los Angeles, milhares de tubarões aterrorizam a população alagada, e o assassino mais mortal da natureza domina o mar, a terra e o ar.

programme.title: Sharknado 4: Corra para o 4º
programme.desc: Cinco anos após a onda de sharknados que assolou a costa leste, nossos heróis vivem uma vida tranquila no meio do país - o mais longe possível dos tubarões. Mas quando um estranho sharknado de areia atinge Las Vegas, Fin é jogado de volta à ação, lutando contra sharknados em uma corrida cross-country para salvar sua família e o mundo - como toda a humanidade já deveria saber, não há como escapar..

programme.title: Iceman: O Viajante do Tempo

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança
programme.desc: Esta é a história de Angélica, uma garota de 16 anos que está lutando contra um tipo raro de câncer chamado Síndrome Mielodisplásica, sua luta para tentar viver uma vida normal e sua esperança de encontrar seu primeiro amor antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: Trenk, O Cavaleiro Trapalhão
programme.desc: Trenk quer tornar-se um cavaleiro e liberar sua família. Depois de muitas aventuras, ele resolve o problema do dragão e é condecorado pelo Duque.

programme.title: Sharky, o Pequeno Pirata
programme.desc: Destemido e cheio de risadas. O Capitão Sharky e sua animada tripulação partem para aventuras emocionantes e assustadoras, nas quais aprendem que, mais do que ser o pirata mais temível, é preciso ser um bom amigo

programme.title: Em Busca Do Castelo Dourado
programme.desc: Quando o rei e a rainha são envenenados, os irmãos Per e Pal são presos suspeitos do crime. O caçula da família, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendário castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da Água da Vida - a única coisa que pode curar os pais de Kristin e salvar o reino.

programme.title: Ploddy II, o Fusquinha da Policia
programme.desc: O carro de polícia Ploddy tem a missão de proteger a maior atração de um parque norueguês: uma águia-mãe em extinção e seu ovo. No entanto, quando duas ladras roubam a águia-mãe e Ploddy acaba chocando o ovo sob seu capô, ele se vê muito mais ocupado do que o esperado. O fato de seu policial Richard se apaixonar por uma das ladras também não ajuda.

programme.title: Palau: Um Homem de Fé
programme.desc: "Palau: Um Homem de Fé" é um longa-metragem que celebra o legado de Luis Palau, um dos líderes religiosos mais influentes da última década.

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança
programme.desc: Esta é a história de Angélica, uma garota de 16 anos que está lutando contra um tipo raro de câncer chamado Síndrome Mielodisplásica, sua luta para tentar viver uma vida normal e sua esperança de encontrar seu primeiro amor antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: Trenk, O Cavaleiro Trapalhão
programme.desc: Trenk quer tornar-se um cavaleiro e liberar sua família. Depois de muitas aventuras, ele resolve o problema do dragão e é condecorado pelo Duque.

programme.title: Sharky, o Pequeno Pirata

programme.title: Em Busca Do Castelo Dourado
programme.desc: Quando o rei e a rainha são envenenados, os irmãos Per e Pal são presos suspeitos do crime. O caçula da família, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendário castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da Água da Vida - a única coisa que pode curar os pais de Kristin e salvar o reino.

programme.title: Zumbiologia - Aproveite essa Noite
programme.desc: Lung (Michael Ning) e Chi-Yeung (Louis Cheung) são dois jovens melhores amigos que vivem a vida de maneira irresponsável e despreocupada. Quando um estranho monstro surge na cidade e começa a transformar as pessoas em zumbis, eles decidem se tornar heróis e embarcam em uma jornada para salvar a Terra.

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu país, uma pobre família viaja em busca de melhores condições de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles são atacados por uma gangue de cruéis fora-da-lei, que só poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: A Maldição da Floresta
programme.desc: Adam e Clare se mudam para uma área rural com seu filho recém-nascido. Eles logo começam a receber avisos sobre espíritos malignos na região, mas a jovem família prefere apreciar a beleza da floresta.

programme.title: O Monstro Dentro de Você
programme.desc: Em uma comunidade desolada, repleta de viciados, após uma noite louca, Lou acorda com sintomas de uma doença.

programme.title: Ouija Exorcismo
programme.desc: Em 1985, um exorcista famoso prendeu um demônio horrível dentro de um tabuleiro Ouija. Pensando que o tabuleiro era um jogo, seu filho jogou sem obedecer às regras e soltou o demônio.

programme.title: Siembamba: A Canção Do Mal
programme.desc: O choro incessante do seu bebê, sentimentos crescentes de culpa e paranoia levam Chloe a uma depressão sombria. Desorientada, ela visita o psicólogo, Dr. Timothy Reed, que diagnostica seus pensamentos e sentimentos como depressão pós-parto. O mundo ao seu redor implode e fica claro que ela e seu filho estão em perigo iminente. Mas de quê?

programme.title: Shark Season
programme.desc: Um grande tubarão branco persegue incansavelmente três praticantes de caiaque em uma ilha remota. Enquanto esperam pela chegada de ajuda, a maré começa a subir, forçando-os a voltar para as águas mortais. Agora a corrida começou enquanto o tubarão ameaça abatê-los no caminho de volta ao continente.

programme.title: Zumbiologia - Aproveite essa Noite
programme.desc: Lung (Michael Ning) e Chi-Yeung (Louis Cheung) são dois jovens melhores amigos que vivem a vida de maneira irresponsável e despreocupada. Quando um estranho monstro surge na cidade e começa a transformar as pessoas em zumbis, eles decidem se tornar heróis e embarcam em uma jornada para salvar a Terra.

programme.title: A Maldição da Floresta
programme.desc: Adam e Clare se mudam para uma área rural com seu filho recém-nascido. Eles logo começam a receber avisos sobre espíritos malignos na região, mas a jovem família prefere apreciar a beleza da floresta.

programme.title: O Monstro Dentro de Você
programme.desc: Em uma comunidade desolada, repleta de viciados, após uma noite louca, Lou acorda com sintomas de uma doença.

programme.title: Em Campo Minado
programme.desc: Em setembro de 2006 no Afeganistão, três jovens soldados britânicos são enviados para dispersar um bloqueio Talibã, mas ao passarem pelo leito de um rio, um dos patrulheiros pisa em uma mina, deixada pela ocupação russa 25 anos atrás. Seus colegas pedem ajuda para resgatar o rapaz, que pode morrer ou ficar gravemente ferido. Mas logo que o reforço chega, eles descobrem que estão cercados por minas e que qualquer movimento em falso pode ser fatal.

programme.title: Sem evidências
programme.desc: Dizem que os crimes foram satânicos. A verdade pode ser mais assustadora.

programme.title: Passagem Para a Vida
programme.desc: Um estranho chega a uma pequena cidade planejando roubar o banco, mas seus planos tomam um rumo improvável.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres dos anos 1960, um zelador idoso convence um executivo com restrições de teto de vidro a ajudá-lo a roubar um punhado de diamantes de seu empregador, a London Diamond Corporation.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) está com vários problemas em sua vida. O prédio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano está sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dívida. O escolhido é Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat vá até seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: Dupla em Fúria
programme.desc: O jovem detetive Wang Bu'er e seu amigo Huang Feihong embarcam em uma investigação cheia de emoção e eventos inesperados.

programme.title: Sangue Na Veia
programme.desc: Uma mulher se vê contra o submundo do crime quando seu marido desaparece durante a lua-de-mel. Decidida a recuperá-lo, ela enfrentará qualquer um que cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Sem evidências
programme.desc: Dizem que os crimes foram satânicos. A verdade pode ser mais assustadora.

programme.title: Passagem Para a Vida
programme.desc: Um estranho chega a uma pequena cidade planejando roubar o banco, mas seus planos tomam um rumo improvável.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres dos anos 1960, um zelador idoso convence um executivo com restrições de teto de vidro a ajudá-lo a roubar um punhado de diamantes de seu empregador, a London Diamond Corporation.

programme.title: O Relutante Fundamentalista
programme.desc: Um jovem paquistanês se vê em um conflito entre seu sonho americano, uma crise de reféns e sua terra natal.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: Um motorista luta para pagar uma dívida. Ele assume um trabalho com um passageiro louco e perigoso.

programme.title: Mosquitos Assassinos
programme.desc: Durante um fim de semana, um grupo de amigos isolados numa casa de campo, é atacado por um enxame de mosquitos assassinos que se alimentam de carne humana como piranhas. Sem poder fugir eles têm apenas uma chance de sobreviver: declarar guerra aos insetos!

programme.title: Flypaper
programme.desc: Una extraña coincidencia hace que dos bandas atraquen el mismo banco a la misma hora. Un peculiar cliente (Patrick Dempsey) y una resuelta cajera (Ashley Judd) pondrán en juego su ingenio y su valor para intentar frustrar el golpe.

programme.title: Enquanto Somos Jovens
programme.desc: Josh e Cornelia, um casal sem filhos começa a passar mais tempo com um jovem casal de hipsters. Um jovem aspirante a documentarista, uma vocação que ações Josh. Logo o casal mais velho começa a desfrutar da energia transmitida pela geração mais jovem, mas, eventualmente, Josh começa a suspeitar que seu novo melhor amigo pode não ser tão honesto e confiável como o esperado.

programme.title: Colossal
programme.desc: Depois de perder o emprego e ser expulsa de seu apartamento pelo namorado, Gloria deixa sua vida em Nova York e retorna à sua cidade natal. Quando o noticiário informa que uma criatura gigantesca está destruindo Seul, na Coreia, Gloria percebe que ela mesma está ligada a esse fenômeno distante. Gloria descobrirá por que ela tem um efeito tão colossal sobre o destino da Terra.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: Quatro Garotas... Uma Grande Confusão
programme.desc: Iris começa seu primeiro dia como temporária na Global Credit Association esperando em uma cadeira por duas horas. Isso prepara o cenário para suas (des)aventuras com os outros "órfãos corporativos", Margaret, Paula e Jane.

programme.title: Todo Mundo Hispânico
programme.desc: Uma paródia de filmes espanhóis contemporâneos.

programme.title: Mosquitos Assassinos
programme.desc: Durante um fim de semana, um grupo de amigos isolados numa casa de campo, é atacado por um enxame de mosquitos assassinos que se alimentam de carne humana como piranhas. Sem poder fugir eles têm apenas uma chance de sobreviver: declarar guerra aos insetos!

programme.title: Flypaper
programme.desc: Una extraña coincidencia hace que dos bandas atraquen el mismo banco a la misma hora. Un peculiar cliente (Patrick Dempsey) y una resuelta cajera (Ashley Judd) pondrán en juego su ingenio y su valor para intentar frustrar el golpe.
